pr_title: Avoid null values when resolving alternative priority

timeline.message: Avoid null values when resolving alternative priority

timeline.bodyText: At this point priority1 and priority2 may not be null. So I'd either remove the checks or throw an ISE or something like that.
timeline.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText: I can change to ISE. Paranoid as getting here in the first place was unexpected. ;)
replies.author: ebullient
